import React, {useState} from 'react' import {Button} from 'reactstrap' //import BrickModal from './BrickModal' import './Letras.css' import lettler_a from "./Letras/Minusculas/a.svg"; import lettler_b from "./Letras/Minusculas/b.svg"; import lettler_c from "./Letras/Minusculas/c.svg"; import lettler_d from "./Letras/Minusculas/d.svg"; import lettler_e from "./Letras/Minusculas/e.svg"; import lettler_f from "./Letras/Minusculas/f.svg"; import lettler_g from "./Letras/Minusculas/g.svg"; import lettler_h from "./Letras/Minusculas/h.svg"; import lettler_i from "./Letras/Minusculas/i.svg"; import lettler_j from "./Letras/Minusculas/j.svg"; import lettler_k from "./Letras/Minusculas/k.svg"; import lettler_l from "./Letras/Minusculas/l.svg"; import lettler_m from "./Letras/Minusculas/m.svg"; import lettler_n from "./Letras/Minusculas/n.svg"; import lettler_o from "./Letras/Minusculas/o.svg"; import lettler_p from "./Letras/Minusculas/p.svg"; import lettler_q from "./Letras/Minusculas/q.svg"; import lettler_r from "./Letras/Minusculas/r.svg"; import lettler_s from "./Letras/Minusculas/s.svg"; import lettler_t from "./Letras/Minusculas/t.svg"; import lettler_u from "./Letras/Minusculas/u.svg"; import lettler_v from "./Letras/Minusculas/v.svg"; import lettler_w from "./Letras/Minusculas/w.svg"; import lettler_x from "./Letras/Minusculas/x.svg"; import lettler_y from "./Letras/Minusculas/y.svg"; import lettler_z from "./Letras/Minusculas/z.svg"; import ModalTemp from './Modal'; /*const buildColor = (color) => { return { color } }*/ function Letras(props) { let english = []; let spanish = []; let html = ""; const letras = [ {// 0 id: "letter_a", color: "#ff8500", nombre: "orange", ruta: lettler_a, alt: "a" }, {// 1 id: "letter_b", color: "#ff8500", nombre: "orange", ruta: letter_b, alt: "b" }, {// 2 id: "letter_c", color: "#ff8500", nombre: "orange", ruta: letter_c, alt: "c" }, {// 3 id: "letter_d", color: "#ff8500", nombre: "orange", ruta: letter_d, alt: "d" }, {// 4 id: "letter_e", color: "#00861c", nombre: "green", ruta: letter_e, alt: "e" }, {// 5 id: "letter_f", color: "#00861c", nombre: "green", ruta: letter_f, alt: "f" }, {// 6 id: "letter_g", color: "#00861c", nombre: "green", ruta: letter_g, alt: "g" }, {// 7 id: "letter_h", color: "#00861c", nombre: "green", ruta: letter_h, alt: "h" }, {// 8 id: "letter_i", color: "#0055bf", nombre: "blue", ruta: letter_i, alt: "i" }, {// 9 id: "letter_j", color: "#0055bf", nombre: "blue", ruta: letter_j, alt: "j" }, {// 10 id: "letter_k", color: "#0055bf", nombre: "blue", ruta: letter_k, alt: "k" }, {// 11 id: "letter_l", color: "#0055bf", nombre: "blue", ruta: letter_l, alt: "l" }, {// 12 id: "letter_m", color: "#51a5db", nombre: "ligth-blue", ruta: letter_m, alt: "m" }, {// 13 id: "letter_n", color: "#51a5db", nombre: "ligth-blue", ruta: letter_n, alt: "n" }, {// 14 id: "letter_o", color: "#51a5db", nombre: "ligth-blue", ruta: letter_o, alt: "o" }, {// 15 id: "letter_p", color: "#51a5db", nombre: "ligth-blue", ruta: letter_p, alt: "p" }, {// 16 id: "letter_q", color: "#ffed00", nombre: "yellow", ruta: letter_q, alt: "q" }, {// 17 id: "letter_r", color: "#ffed00", nombre: "yellow", ruta: letter_r, alt: "r" }, {// 18 id: "letter_s", color: "#ffed00", nombre: "yellow", ruta: letter_s, alt: "s" }, {// 19 id: "letter_t", color: "#ffed00", nombre: "yellow", ruta: letter_t, alt: "t" }, {// 20 id: "letter_u", color: "#e3000b", nombre: "red", ruta: letter_u, alt: "u" }, {// 21 id: "letter_v", color: "#e3000b", nombre: "red", ruta: letter_v, alt: "v" }, {// 22 id: "letter_w", color: "#e3000b", nombre: "red", ruta: letter_w, alt: "w" }, {// 23 id: "letter_x", color: "#e3000b", nombre: "red", ruta: letter_x, alt: "x" }, {// 24 id: "letter_y", color: "#e3000b", nombre: "red", ruta: letter_y, alt: "y" }, {// 25 id: "letter_z", color: "#e3000b", nombre: "red", ruta: letter_z, alt: "z" } ]; const createBlocks = (e) => { html = ""; for (let i = 0; i < spanish.length; i++) { let txtDiv = ' setLettler(e)}>'; html += txtDiv; } return html; } const nextImage = (e) => { setCountBlock(countBlock + 1) setColors(); } const setColors = (e) => { english = []; spanish = []; let blockColors = ["verde","celeste","azul","rojo","naranja","amarillo"]; let color = blockColors[countBlock] switch(color){ case "verde": spanish[0] = letras[21];//V spanish[1] = letras[4];//E spanish[2] = letras[17];//R spanish[3] = letras[3];//D spanish[4] = letras[4];//E english[0] = letras[6];//G english[1] = letras[17];//R english[2] = letras[4];//E english[3] = letras[4];//E english[4] = letras[13];//N break; case "celeste": spanish[0] = letras[2];//C spanish[1] = letras[4];//E spanish[2] = letras[11];//L spanish[3] = letras[4];//E spanish[4] = letras[18];//S spanish[5] = letras[19];//T spanish[6] = letras[4];//E english[0] = letras[11];//L english[1] = letras[8];//I english[2] = letras[6];//G english[3] = letras[7];//H english[4] = letras[19];//T english[5] = " ";//ESPACIO english[6] = letras[1];//B english[7] = letras[11];//L english[8] = letras[20];//U english[9] = letras[4];//E break; case "azul": spanish[0] = letras[0];//A spanish[1] = letras[25];//Z spanish[2] = letras[20];//U spanish[3] = letras[11];//L english[0] = letras[1];//B english[1] = letras[11];//L english[2] = letras[20];//U english[3] = letras[4];//E break; case "rojo": spanish[0] = letras[17];//R spanish[1] = letras[14];//O spanish[2] = letras[9];//J spanish[3] = letras[14];//O english[0] = letras[17];//R english[1] = letras[4];//E english[2] = letras[3];//D break; case "naranja": spanish[0] = letras[0];//A spanish[1] = letras[13];//N spanish[2] = letras[0];//A spanish[3] = letras[17];//R spanish[4] = letras[0];//A spanish[5] = letras[13];//N spanish[6] = letras[9];//J spanish[7] = letras[0];//A spanish[8] = letras[3];//D spanish[9] = letras[14];//O english[0] = letras[14];//O english[1] = letras[17];//R english[2] = letras[0];//A english[3] = letras[13];//N english[4] = letras[6];//G english[5] = letras[4];//E break; case "amarillo": spanish[0] = letras[0];//A spanish[1] = letras[12];//M spanish[2] = letras[0];//A spanish[3] = letras[17];//R spanish[4] = letras[8];//I spanish[5] = letras[11];//L spanish[6] = letras[11];//L spanish[7] = letras[14];//O english[0] = letras[24];//Y english[1] = letras[4];//E english[2] = letras[11];//L english[3] = letras[11];//L english[4] = letras[14];//O english[5] = letras[22];//W break; } displayBlocks(); } const playAgain = (e) => { let newGame = printImages(); setBlocks(newGame); setRespuestas(0); setCountImage(0); setClassColor(""); setColorBlock(""); handleClose(); } const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const [countBlock, setCountBlock] = useState(0); const [blocks, setBlocks] = useState(printImages); const showModalClick = () => setShowModal(true); return ( <>
)//Fin del Return }//Fin del Componente export default Letras
